QAPair.Question: What is (are) Eating disorders - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide information on eating disorders: Academy for Eating Disorders -- www.aedweb.org , Overeaters Anonymous -- oa.org , National Eating Disorders Association -- www.nationaleatingdisorders.org , National Institute of Mental Health -- www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/eating-disorders , Office on Women's Health, US Department of Health and Human Services -- www.womenshealth.gov/mental-health/body-image-and-mental-health ,
